summary: An amnesiac discovers himself leaping through time between 2000 and 2002 as his past returns to him.
cast: Ryan Phillippe|Sarah Polley|Piper Perabo|Robert Sean Leonard|Peter Egan|Stephen Lang|Rakie Ayola|Stephen Graham|Stephen Rea|Magdalena Manville|Jay Simpson|Paul John Borde|Annabel Mansel Lewis
title: El despertar
